pr_title: HBASE-24751 Display Task completion time and/or processing duration o…

timeline.message: HBASE-24751 Display Task completion time and/or processing duration on Web UI

timeline.bodyText: Do you want to add duration?
timeline.author: saintstack
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -116,6 +117,7 @@ String parent = ""; <% task.getStatus() %> (since <% StringUtils.formatTimeDiff(now, task.getStatusTime()) %> ago) + <% task.getCompletionTimestamp() < 0 ? task.getState() : new Date(task.getCompletionTimestamp()) %>

replies.bodyText: I think that adding completion time is enough, there is already a start time. Do we still need duration?
replies.author: GeorryHuang

replies.bodyText: I think duration would be a nice-to-have. Can add in a follow-on. This is already a nice improvement as is. Thanks.
replies.author: saintstack
